= Introduction =
Camel Route Viewer Uses Eclipse-3.4(Ganymede).

A simple reason:
An import new features in the 3.4 JDT is "Rich hovers-Follow links in Javadoc hover",and Camel Route Viewer consults Javadoc-View implement。:)



= Details =

Required:

You can simple download "Eclipse_IDE_for_Java_EE Developers":http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/ganymede/R/eclipse-jee-ganymede-win32.zip


or:

1.Download [http://www.eclipse.org/ Eclipse 3.4].

2.Download [http://www.eclipse.org/projects/project_summary.php?projectid=tools.gef GEF] Download [http://www.eclipse.org/gef/zest/ zest].


Then:
Open plugin.xml ,in the testing tab,select Lanuch an Eclipse Application。

In the open new Eclipse workspace,you can click the *configure* method ,then in the camel route view will display the visual route. 

You can use thie Java File for test:Test.java
